QuestData.Title: The Land Provides
QuestData.Description: The icevines of the Shivering Trench have developed a powerful resistance to cold temperatures. Integrating them into the construction materials of the garrison should prove useful.
QuestData.RewardText: Now this is some handy stuff. This weather has been cutting through our supplies of rope so quick we need something we can use to provide an alternative. Looks like you scored the jackpot.
